application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: We want to crown lift 02 Cedar by 2m as per the health and safety survey, we are not reducing it by any width or height.As with all the other work we are not reducing width or height we are just removing the deadwood.01- Cedar - carry out a written climbing Inspection.- Exempt work02 - Cedar - crown lift by 2m and carry out a resistograph02 - To give sufficient clearance from the property to enable maintenance and prevent possible damage12 - London Plane - Remove hanging limb12 - Works following a Health and Safety Survey20 - remove the hanging limb.20 - Works following a Health and Safety Survey49 - Sycamore - remove deadwood within crown.49 - Works following a Health and Safety Survey.50 - Oak -  remove deadwood within crown.50 - Works following a Health and Safety Survey.51 - Sycamore -  remove deadwood within crown.51 - Works following a Health and Safety Survey.57 - Norway Maple - remove the hanging limb.57 - Works following a Health and Safety Survey.58 - Norway Maple - sever and remove 2 m section of ivy - Exempt.66 - Sycamore -  remove deadwood within crown.66 - Works following a Health and Safety Survey.90 - Sycamore - Remove deadwood within crown.90 - Works following a Health and Safety Survey.91 - Lime - Carefully fell to near ground level.91 - The removal of a dead tree
